# venue(for:)

**Type Method**

Returns an electricity venue for the given venue identifier.

## Declaration

```swift
static func venue(for id: UUID) async throws -> EnergyVenue
```

## Parameters

- **id**: The requested venue’s identifier.

## Discussion

This method throws [doc://com.apple.energykit/documentation/EnergyKit/EnergyKitError/venueUnavailable] if the framework can’t provide the requested venue.

## Returning electricity sites

- **venue(matchingHomeUniqueIdentifier:)**: Returns an energy venue for the given HomeKit identifier.
